name: tomtom-mcp-server
title: TomTom MCP Server
summary: The TomTom MCP Server is a managed service that provides AI systems with essential, real-time geolocation capabilities—including search, multi-modal routing, and real-time traffic and visual context—to overcome spatial and temporal blindness and make reliable, real-world decisions. The TomTom MCP Server is currently available in Beta (Public Preview).
description:
The TomTom MCP Server is a managed server that acts as a standardized, low-latency conduit, providing AI systems with essential, real-time TomTom geospatial data to overcome spatial and temporal blindness.

Key Functionalities:
1. Search & Geocoding: Converts addresses/locations into precise coordinates, performs reverse lookups, and executes fuzzy searches for points of interest (POIs) globally.
2. Multi-Modal Routing: Calculates optimized routes for various transportation methods, including driving, cycling, and walking, enabling complex door-to-door journey planning.
3. Real-Time Traffic Context: Provides current Traffic Incidents and flow data for making dynamic, effective route decisions, rerouting, and generating predictive Estimated Times of Arrival (ETAs).
4. Visual Context (Static Maps): Generates visual representations (static map images) of routes or locations for reporting, workflow consumption, or human verification.

Typical Scenarios:
- Logistics & Delivery Optimization: An AI system plans and adjusts delivery routes in real time based on current traffic to meet promised delivery windows.
- Ride-Hailing/Mobility Services: An agent calculates optimized, multi-modal travel paths for users, integrating driving, walking, or public transport segments.
- Emergency Response/Field Service: Automatically locating incident addresses and calculating the quickest route for field agents or first responders.
- Workflow Automation: Generating static map images for a human reviewer to quickly verify a route or location before a task is executed.

The TomTom MCP Server is currently available in Beta (Public Preview).
